About

I’m a Chartered Engineer living in Dubai and working for Arup with my wife and two sons. We are an Apple family and frankly like it that way.

This is my thought space. It’s published on Micro.blog. If you’d like to comment on anything I write about that’s the best way to do it. The feed however gets reposted over on Twitter, which I check sporadically as well.

Head on over to my Pinboard for some linky goodness.

My text editor of choice is iA Writer (soon using across all platforms). Graphics are created in the Affinity suite of software.

This site is typset in Merriweather and Archivo Narrow.

© 2018 Khaled Abou Alfa. Follow @kaa on Micro.blog.
